# Welcome to My Website!

Welcome! My name is Yicheng Shen, a PhD student in the Department of Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.\
Feel free to explore this (newly created) site to learn more about me.

### Research Interests:

Bayesian hierarchical modeling and diagnostics, (network) meta-analysis, latent variable modeling, network analysis, causal inference, interdisciplinary research with applied statistics in health and social sciences.

If you every want to connect with me, please refer to any of the links.
